name: myweb

scripts.system:health: curl http://localhost:8000/health || echo 'FastAPI server not running'
scripts.api:stop: lsof -ti :8000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || echo 'No process on port 8000'
scripts.api:health: curl -s http://localhost:8000/health | json_pp || echo 'API not responding'
scripts.db:setup: echo 'Please run the SQL scripts in Supabase Dashboard'
scripts.db:check: node -e "console.log('Checking database connection...'); import('./src/supabaseClient.js').then(({supabase}) => supabase.from('users').select('count').limit(1).then(r => console.log('✅ Database connected')).catch(e => console.error('❌ Database error:', e.message)))"
scripts.logs:api: tail -f face_recognition_server/logs/*.log 2>/dev/null || echo 'No API logs found'
scripts.install:deps: npm install && cd face_recognition_server && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.start:prod: concurrently "cd face_recognition_server && uvicorn main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000" "npm run preview:frontend"

author: Your Name
description: Face Recognition Attendance System with Motion Detection
